member.name: T:Huminex.Api.Controllers.AuthController
member.summary: Authentication APIs for login, refresh, and logout operations.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.AuthController.Login(Huminex.ModuleContracts.IdentityAccess.LoginRequest)
member.summary: Authenticates a user and returns an access token and refresh token.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.AuthController.Refresh(Huminex.ModuleContracts.IdentityAccess.RefreshTokenRequest)
member.summary: Issues a new access token using a valid refresh token.
member.returns: New token pair preserving refresh token lifecycle.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.AuthController.Logout(Huminex.ModuleContracts.IdentityAccess.LogoutRequest)
member.summary: Invalidates a refresh token for the current user session.
member.returns: No content when logout is accepted.

member.name: T:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OpenHumanController
member.summary: OpenHuman interview lifecycle APIs.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OpenHumanController.Schedule(Huminex.ModuleContracts.OpenHuman.ScheduleInterviewRequest)
member.summary: Schedules a new interview session for a candidate.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OpenHumanController.GetAll
member.summary: Lists interviews visible to the requester.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OpenHumanController.GetById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets a specific interview by identifier.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OpenHumanController.Reschedule(System.Guid,Huminex.ModuleContracts.OpenHuman.RescheduleInterviewRequest)
member.summary: Reschedules an existing interview.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OpenHumanController.Scorecard(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns detailed interview scoring card.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OpenHumanController.Transcript(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns transcript artifact reference for an interview.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OpenHumanController.Recording(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns recording artifact metadata for an interview.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OpenHumanController.Export(System.Guid)
member.summary: Exports interview result artifacts for HR and hiring manager workflows.

member.name: T:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OrganizationController

member.summary: Organization hierarchy and employee directory APIs.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OrganizationController.GetStructure(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns hierarchy nodes for organization tree rendering.
member.returns: Organization node collection with manager links.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OrganizationController.GetEmployees(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns paginated employees for the current tenant.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OrganizationController.GetEmployeeById(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a single employee by identifier inside tenant scope.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OrganizationController.GetManagerChain(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns manager chain from direct manager to top-level manager.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.OrganizationController.GetDirectReports(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns direct reports for a manager.

member.name: T:Huminex.Api.Controllers.PayrollController
member.summary: Payroll processing and payslip APIs.
Payroll processing and payslip APIs.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.PayrollController.GetRuns(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Lists payroll runs for the current tenant ordered by period descending.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.PayrollController.CreateRun(Huminex.ModuleContracts.Payroll.CreatePayrollRunRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new payroll run for a specific yyyy-MM period.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.PayrollController.ApproveRun(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Approves a payroll run.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.PayrollController.DisburseRun(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Marks a payroll run as disbursed.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.PayrollController.GetPayslips(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Lists all payslips for an employee.
member.returns: Payslip list ordered by period descending.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.PayrollController.GetPayslipByPeriod(System.Guid,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a single payslip for an employee and yyyy-MM period.

member.name: M:Huminex.Api.Controllers.PayrollController.EmailPayslip(System.Guid,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Queues email delivery for an employee payslip for a specific period.
